name: Simple space (MakhamDev)
description:
Simple Space

A simple space shooter. Build ship, shoot, shoot, and shoot.

Tips

  • Color indicate difficulty from low - high
    • White
    • Cyan
    • Lime
    • Yellow
    • Orange
    • Red
    • Purple
  • Upgrades with line connected mean that you can only choose one.
Windows version is a bit more smooth and stable than web version, if you found a bug, please indicate which version you're playing on.
